snippet: From Pacific Natural Foods, a Thanksgiving staple made with organic cranberries and organic sugar.
abstract: Pacific Natural Foods introduces jellied cranberry sauce for Thanksgiving that is made with organic cranberries and organic sugar, which is available at Fairway Markets.
lead_paragraph: From Pacific Natural Foods, a Thanksgiving staple made with organic cranberries and organic sugar.
